title: Stinking Cloud
content:
Stinking Cloud Level 3 Conjuration Spell Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions. 10 turns 6m 18m CON Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Conjuration Spell

Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions.

6m 18m CON Save Concentration

Stinking Cloud is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Stinking Cloud is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Stinking Cloud Information

Description: Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m 6m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Constitution

How to Acquire Stinking Cloud

Stinking Cloud can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, The Fiend, Circle of the Land: Underdark & Swamp Stinking Cloud can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, The Fiend, Circle of the Land: Underdark & Swamp

Stinking Cloud Tips & Notes

Inflicts the Nauseous Condition: Poisoned. Can't take Actions. ???
